item.title: About me
item.description: Professional Jon Zlotnik is an excited and creative software developer and information security specialist. His most recent experience includes applied cryptography, cloud security, identity management, and enterprise software tools development. He loves working on proof-of-concept, and highly innovative projects, as well as pushing the limits of cloud technology. Hobbies After work he goes horseback riding and is schooled in dressage by his girlfriend. Depending on the Canadian weather, he’ll take any opportunity to go sailing or skiing.
